title: Copy a File from Another Branch (Challenge)
description: In Git, branches are used to isolate development work without affecting other branches in the repository. Sometimes, you may need to copy a file from another branch to the current branch. This challenge will test your ability to copy a file from another branch using Git.

meta.title: Git Playground | Copy File from Another Branch
meta.description: Learn how to copy a file from one Git branch to another in this programming tutorial overview.
meta.keywords: Git, branching, file management, version control, programming tutorial

steps.title: Copy a File from Another Branch

verify.name: Verify for successful copying
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
